Item Description: RF TXRX MOD BT WIFI THCHAS MNT
Comments:
- ESP32 bluetooth module to serve as a serial bridge between mouse and laptop
- perfect for our application- Sparkfun has a dev board doing exactly what we want

- 22uF cap to decouple ESP32 module power
- 0603 package

- 0.1uF cap to decouple ESP32 module power
- 0402 package

- 10k resistor to slow down ESP32 module power up 
- 0402 package

- 1uF cap to slow down ESP32 module power up
- 0402 package
- pushbutton for ESP32 module boot option
- female 2.54mm pitch connector to connect to mouse

- solid and cheap PCB vendor
- no issues so far, purple nice and deep purple
